title: Mastery Bug!
body:
When i open and edit my Mastery in Champion Select, sometimes the Mastery Icon doesn't change colour, as if it wasn't selected, but i still hear the sound it makes when you select the icon. Even though it stays uncoloured, once in game my Mastery Keystone shows that i chose a mastery (and it is working - colossus and thunder lord), however, back in Champion Select it was uncolourd as if it wasn't picked. Also, when i press Reset Points, the selected (coloured) mastery icons remains, but when selecting another mastery icon, it will not show colour but the sound can be heared, but the previous selected mastery wont change colour. 
Is this a Game Bug (Visual Error) or PC Error?

Edit: This is in Alpha Client
